source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_SEQ_00<tab>Who is this unfamiliar woman, and what secrets does she hold?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_SEQ_00<tab>La jeune inconnue doit détenir la clef du mystère du Masque blanc.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_SEQ_01<tab>The woman reveals herself as Cecy, sister to Ellie and the woman behind the phantom thief's many masks. She further tells of her quest for vengeance against Ul'dah for the heinous crime of turning her ancestors into zombies─a historical fact covered up, she insists, by Phillice and her fellow Arbiters. Seeking to deliver revenge by her own hand, Cecy casts a handful of zombie powder at Phillice, only to see the ever-chivalrous Hildibrand take the brunt of the attack in her stead. As all look on with shock and dismay, Hildibrand's mother, Julyan, arrives on the scene. Distressed at the sight of her beloved son in his zombified state, she delivers a violent reckoning to her husband Godbert, whom she holds responsible for Hildibrand's plight, and Gilgamesh, who really just picked a bad time to show up. Fortunately, she takes an instant liking to you, and enlists your aid in saving her son from permanently joining the ranks of the undead. Speak with the imposing matron and see what she has in mind.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_SEQ_01<tab>La jeune fille que vous avez démasquée s'est révélée être Cecy, la sœur cadette d'Ellie. Hildibrand s'est effondré après avoir reçu la poudre putréfactrice lancée par celle-ci de plein fouet. Consultez sa mère, Julyan, pour trouver une solution.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_SEQ_02<tab>Julyan explains that holy water is a well-known remedy for those afflicted with a case of zombie-ism, and assures you that she can fashion a dose from two ingredients─Oversoul rags and twice-distilled water. That said, the cleansing agent must be administered before the ichor has diffused throughout the entire body. With time being of the essence, she sends you and a befuddled Gilgamesh into town to retrieve the necessary materials: the rags from Syntgoht of Syntgoht's Sundries, and the water from a trader by the name of Gest.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_SEQ_02<tab>Julyan pense pouvoir fabriquer une eau bénite spéciale pour inverser le processus de zombification de Hildibrand à condition que vous lui rameniez le nécessaire pour la préparer, à savoir <var 33 ((EventItem)) 02F61E8A970202 /var> et <var 33 ((EventItem)) 02F61E8A980202 /var>. Vous pourrez acheter la première à Syntgoht, dans l'avenue du Saphir.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_SEQ_03<tab>A well-timed visit from Avila, the gladiatrix who you and Hildibrand befriended in your recent travails at the Coliseum, proves to be just the ticket in convincing Syntgoht to part with the last piece of Oversoul rags he has in stock. Count your blessings and seek out Gest at the Hustings Strip.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_SEQ_03<tab>Grâce à l'in<var 16 /var>ter<var 16 /var>ven<var 16 /var>tion surprise d'Avila, vous avez pu vous procurer le tissu demandé. Maintenant, allez chercher le second objet, <var 33 ((EventItem)) 02F61E8A980202 /var>, que vous pourrez acheter à Gest, au district politique du faubourg de Thal.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_SEQ_04<tab>Gest proves to be a thoroughly unpleasant sort who would just as soon see Hildibrand die on account of his dislike for the way the Manderville family conducts its business. Just as all hope seems lost, the most fortuitous appearance of Arabella, the maiden you and Hildibrand befriended at Costa del Sol, has Gest changing his tune, as he begrudgingly parts with a bottle of twice-distilled water in return for a dance with the lapis-tressed beauty. With the two ingredients safely in hand, deliver them to Julyan back at the vault and hope there is still time to save the unfortunate Hildibrand.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_SEQ_04<tab>Avec l'aide fortuite d'Arabella, vous avez réussi à obtenir <var 33 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8A980202 /var> dont vous aviez besoin. Retournez voir Julyan et remettez-lui au plus vite les précieux ingrédients pour qu'elle puisse fabriquer le remède destiné à son fils.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_SEQ_05<tab>Julyan swiftly synthesizes a phial of holy water and administers it to Hildibrand, assuring you that her son is strong enough of will and body to fight off the zombie curse. She promises to see to his care, urging you to go and stop Ellie before she can bring her plan to fruition─using the four relics to break the ancient Sil'dihn seal and drown all of Ul'dah in zombie dust. She further cows Gilgamesh into making another trip to the markets to procure the fire crystals to keep her son's body warm. Gilgamesh stands over a crate of crystals, wistfully recalling old times with his feathered companion. As he delivers a heartfelt plea, a blinding flash of light comes down from the heavens, reuniting the traveling warrior with a long-absent friend...
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_SEQ_05<tab>Julyan a appliqué la préparation sur Hildibrand. Il n'y a maintenant plus qu'à espérer qu'elle fasse effet, si celui-ci a toutefois assez de force pour se remettre de la terrible affliction.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Julyan.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_TODO_00<tab>Parler à Julyan

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_TODO_01<tab>Procure Oversoul rags from Syntgoht.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_TODO_01<tab>Se procurer <var 33 ((EventItem)) 02F61E8A970202 /var> auprès de Syntgoht

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_TODO_02<tab>Procure twice-distilled water from Gest.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_TODO_02<tab>Demander <var 33 ((EventItem)) 02F61E8A980202 /var> à Gest

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_TODO_03<tab>Deliver the Oversoul rags and twice-distilled water to Julyan.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_TODO_03<tab>Donner <var 33 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8A970202 /var> et <var 33 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8A980202 /var> à Julyan

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_PHILLICE_000_020<tab>I was all but certain that Ellie was our thief. What is the meaning of this!?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_PHILLICE_000_020<tab>Mais qui est cette personne<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_BRIARDIEN_000_021<tab>Another two-layered mask, mayhap? But no...this woman bears a striking resemblance to Miss Ellie.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_BRIARDIEN_000_021Est-ce encore un double déguisement...?
Il y a comme une ressemblance avec Ellie...

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GODBERT_000_022<tab>So the letters spoke true─the fiend was in our midst all along.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GODBERT_000_022<tab>L'auteur des lettres anonymes avait raison<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_HILDIBRAND_000_023<tab>My prodigious powers of deduction scream out to me: this woman knows something!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_HILDIBRAND_000_023<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, interrogeons-la<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_CECY_100_000<tab>...Seven hells. Done in by a muscle-bound muttonhead and his motley troupe of mummers.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_CECY_100_000<tab>Zut... Je suis démasquée<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_BRIARDIEN_100_001<tab>Just who <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> you? Your resemblance to Miss Ellie is most uncanny, and yet...
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_BRIARDIEN_100_001<tab>Mais qui êtes-vous<var 1D /var>? Quel est votre lien avec Ellie<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_CECY_100_002<tab>...Consulting Inspector Briardien. Once again, you fail to measure up to your lofty reputation.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_CECY_100_002<tab>Cher baron détective, évidemment que je lui ressemble...

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_CECY_100_003<tab>Of course we resemble each other. Ellie is, after all, my own flesh and blood. My beloved sister, and my eminently capable partner in crime.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_CECY_100_003<tab>Et pour cause, Ellie est ma sœur<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_CECY_100_004<tab>(-Cecy-)A thousand faces I may wear, but only one name do I bear. You can call me Cecy. Charmed, I'm sure.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_CECY_100_004<tab>(-Cecy-)<var 1A 02 /var>Enchantée<var 1A 01 /var>, mon nom est Cecy. Je suis la sœur cadette d'Ellie, nous avons grandi ensemble.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_CECY_100_005<tab>(-Cecy-)Are you quite all right? Why, you look as if you've seen a ghost! Despite my moniker, I assure you that Ellie and I are no specters. What we <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var>, mind you, are the last living scions of Sil'dihn aristocracy.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_CECY_100_005<tab>(-Cecy-)Et alors, pourquoi faites-vous ces têtes-là<var 1D /var>? Nous ne sommes pas des fantômes<var 1D /var>! Nous sommes en réalité les descendantes d'une lignée noble de Sil'dih.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_CECY_100_006<tab>(-Cecy-)Bemused, are you? Befuddled, to find two sisters behind the mask? Try using your brains once in a while. Every time you encountered the thief, Ellie was standing right in your midst.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_CECY_100_006(-Cecy-)Réfléchissez un peu! Des crimes aussi complexes ne pouvaient pas être l'œuvre d'un seul homme!
Et puis, comment Ellie aurait pu jouer le rôle du Masque blanc à Costa del Sol, alors qu'elle se tenait à côté de vous? Elle avait forcément un complice!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_CECY_100_007<tab>(-Cecy-)No, the thief that four times stole the show─oh, and those priceless relics─was me. Meanwhile, Ellie hid in plain sight, supplying me with just the knowledge I needed to stay one step ahead of my pursuers, all while spinning the hair-raising tales of my exploits that won the hearts of this nation.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_CECY_100_007<tab>(-Cecy-)Le Masque blanc que vous avez vu jusqu'à présent, c'était moi<var 1D /var>! Grâce à ma sœur, j'étais au courant de tous vos faits et gestes. Je n'ai eu aucun mal à prévoir vos actions et à vous devancer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_CECY_100_008<tab>(-Cecy-)We owe a lot to you. Truly! Why, without the tales of your hapless attempts to catch me, we never could have risen to these heights of celebrity!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_CECY_100_008<tab>(-Cecy-)En plus, grâce à vous, les articles de ma sœur ont rencontré un immense succès<var 1D /var>! Le Masque blanc ceci, le Masque blanc cela... Ces idiots d'Uldiens n'avaient plus que ce nom à la bouche<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_HILDIBRAND_100_009<tab>...Miss Cecy. From a gentleman to a lady, I would ask you one thing and one thing only. Just what is it that you and Miss Ellie hope to accomplish with all of your schemes?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_HILDIBRAND_100_009<tab>... Mademoiselle Cecy, quel est votre but<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_CECY_100_010<tab>(-Cecy-)Justice! Four hundred years ago, Ul'dahn dogs reduced our great nation to a nation of zombies! At long last, the cowards that would still justify these foul deeds will suffer the same fate!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_CECY_100_010<tab>(-Cecy-)La vengeance, bien évidemment<var 1D /var>! Ul'dah doit payer pour avoir fait massacrer notre peuple, en faisant de nos ancêtres des zombis<var 1D /var>!!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_BRIARDIEN_100_011<tab>...Wait. The histories say that it was <var 1A 02 /var>Sil'dih<var 1A 01 /var> that turned their own men into zombies.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_BRIARDIEN_100_011<tab>Mais... n'est-ce pas Sil'dih qui a pris la décision de changer ses citoyens en zombis<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_CECY_100_012<tab>(-Cecy-)The histories <var 1A 02 /var>lie<var 1A 01 /var>! And <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> work from the shadows, silencing those who would speak the truth! <var 1A 02 /var>You<var 1A 01 /var> should have died with your fellows, false arbiter!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_CECY_100_012(-Cecy-)C'est faux!!
Pas vrai, sale traîtresse!? Tu connais la vérité, toi, j'en suis sûre!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_CECY_100_013<tab>(-Cecy-)It was Ul'dah that ordered the creation of that dreadful powder, and wielded it as a weapon against our proud ancestors. The history of your glorious sultanate is built on a lie!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_CECY_100_013<tab>(-Cecy-)La vérité, c'est que le peuple sildien a été changé <var 1A 02 /var>de force<var 1A 01 /var> en zombis par la poudre putréfactrice... une invention uldienne<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GODBERT_100_014<tab>What is this madness you speak, woman!?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GODBERT_100_014<tab>Quoi<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_CECY_100_015<tab>(-Cecy-)Not madness─<var 1A 02 /var>truth<var 1A 01 /var>! The powder in my possession was stolen from the Ul'dahn army four centuries ago by one of my ancestors. They say it was his final act of courage in the moments before his leg fell off and his rotting head dropped from his shoulders.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_CECY_100_015<tab>(-Cecy-)La poudre que nous avons utilisée est ce qui restait d'un butin dérobé aux Uldiens par un de nos ancêtres<var 1D /var>! Voilà ce qu'Ul'dah a voulu faire oublier<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_CECY_100_016<tab>(-Cecy-)<var 1A 02 /var>This<var 1A 01 /var> is the truth that the histories don't tell. The truth that this doe<var 1F /var>eyed Sultansworn would kill to keep buried deep in the sands of Thanalan!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_CECY_100_016<tab>(-Cecy-)Ces ordures de l'ordre de la Balance œuvrent depuis des années pour faire disparaître tous ceux qui s'approchent de la vérité<var 1D /var>! Ils les intimident ou les empêchent de publier leurs recherches...

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_CECY_100_017<tab>(-Cecy-)...But your time of reckoning is nigh. Oh, yes... Before long, you─and everyone in this rotten nation─will know firsthand the horrors my ancestors knew. Ahahaha!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_CECY_100_017<tab>(-Cecy-)Enfin, tout cela n'a plus d'importance... Puisqu'ils vont tous périr<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_BRIARDIEN_100_018<tab>And just what do you mean by that?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_BRIARDIEN_100_018<tab>Quoi<var 1D /var>!? Que voulez-vous dire<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_CECY_100_019<tab>(-Cecy-)Oh, how the idiots lap up the stories! A masked crusader for justice! A dashing rebel waging battle against power and authority! Oh, if only they knew...
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_CECY_100_019<tab>(-Cecy-)Ces abrutis d'Uldiens aiment les personnages fauteurs de trouble comme le Masque<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_CECY_100_020<tab>(-Cecy-)But they will see soon enough...when they're eating each other's brains out on the streets!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_CECY_100_020<tab>(-Cecy-)Imaginez un peu la tête qu'ils feront lorsqu'ils comprendront que le voleur qu'ils adulaient voulait en fait les changer en zombis<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_CECY_100_021<tab>(-Cecy-)In the last days before our proud nation was razed to the ground, a band of the final survivors stole a vast quantity of the powder from the Ul'dahn vaults, hiding it away in a secret vault sealed with powerful magicks.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_CECY_100_021<tab>(-Cecy-)Alors que la guerre faisait rage, les Sildiens ont réussi à dérober une grande quantité de poudre aux Uldiens. Ils l'ont cachée dans un coffre secret.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_CECY_100_022<tab>(-Cecy-)The sole means by which the vault may be opened? By assembling four secret relics from Belah'dia. Four relics once housed in the royal palace of Sil'dih, before the Ul'dahn dogs stole them and claimed them for their own.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_CECY_100_022<tab>(-Cecy-)Et la clef de ce coffre, c'est... les quatre trésors sacrés de Belah'dia. C'était Sil'dih qui conservait ces objets, autrefois.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_CECY_100_023<tab>(-Cecy-)...And so it dawns upon you at last. Yes, even as we speak, Ellie makes for the vault, the four relics safely in hand. Just think! One day, you'll be able to tell your grandchildren you were there when zombie powder rained down on Ul'dah. No, wait...you'll all be <var 1A 02 /var>dead<var 1A 01 /var>! Ahahaha!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_CECY_100_023<tab>(-Cecy-)Maintenant qu'Ellie s'est emparée du quatrième, elle doit avoir mis la main sur cette poudre. Et elle va bientôt la répandre sur ces ordures d'Uldiens...♪

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_BRIARDIEN_100_024<tab>Preposterous!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_BRIARDIEN_100_024<tab>Non<var 1D /var>! C'est impossible<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_CECY_000_000<tab>But first, <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>, my dear. You will not even have the pleasure of looking upon the last moments of your precious homeland. Let your flesh rot like all of your rotten lies!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_CECY_000_000<tab>Mais assez parlé<var 1D /var>! Maintenant que les dés sont jetés, je vais m'occuper de toi personnellement, traîtresse<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_HILDIBRAND_000_001<tab>I think not, Miss Cecy!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_HILDIBRAND_000_001<tab>Attention<var 1D /var>!!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_BRIARDIEN_000_002<tab>Hildibrand!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_BRIARDIEN_000_002<tab>Hildibrand<var 1D /var>!!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_CECY_000_003<tab>You <var 1A 02 /var>idiot<var 1A 01 /var>! Just for once, could you not get in the way!?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_CECY_000_003<tab>Mais pourquoi cet idiot s'est-il...

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_HATENA_000_004<tab>(-???-)Godbert Manderville! I can't even trust your sorry arse to look after him for a day!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_HATENA_000_004(-???-)Toi!
Comment as-tu pu laisser faire ça!!?

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_JULYAN_000_004<tab>Godbert Manderville! Can I not even trust yer sorry arse to keep an eye on our dear boy for a bloody <var 1A 02 /var>day<var 1A 01 /var>!?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_JULYAN_000_004<tab>Toi<var 1D /var>! Comment as-tu pu laisser faire ça<var 1D /var>!!?

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GODBERT_000_005<tab>I knew it! That presence watching over us from the shadows... It was <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>, my dear wife!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GODBERT_000_005<tab>Julyan<var 1D /var>! C'est toi, chérie<var 1D /var>!? C'était toi, cette présence que j'avais sentie<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_BRIARDIEN_000_006<tab>...Ahem. Am I to understand that you are Hildibrand's...mother?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_BRIARDIEN_000_006<tab>Euh... Vous êtes donc la mère de Hildibrand, si je comprends bien<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GILGAMESH_000_007<tab>Aye, this is more like it! Hand to hand, skillet to skillet...it's enough to send a warrior's pulse racing! Prepare yourself, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! The time of our final confrontation is nigh!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GILGAMESH_000_007<tab>Ça y est, vous avez enfin réglé vos petites histoires<var 1D /var>? Tout est bien qui finit bien, vous avez ce que vous voulez<var 1D /var>? C'est le moment<var 1D /var>! Allez, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, dégaine, j'te lance un défi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_JULYAN_000_008<tab>Do ye have popotoes for brains, you overstuffed buffoon!? My beloved boy's been turned into a stinkin' corpse, if ye hadn't bloody noticed!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_JULYAN_000_008<tab>Non mais dites donc, espèce de grand escogriffe, vous trouvez vraiment que <var 1A 02 /var>tout finit bien<var 1A 01 /var><var 1D /var>!? Vous ne voyez pas que mon cher fils est à terre<var 1D /var>!!?

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_JULYAN_000_009<tab>You! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> or somethin', was it!?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_JULYAN_000_009<tab>Toi<var 1D /var>! Tu t'appelles <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, c'est ça<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_JULYAN_000_010<tab>Hildy's told me all about your high jinks together. Pleased to meet ye!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_JULYAN_000_010<tab>Je sais que tu veilles sur mon fils depuis que vous êtes amis. Merci<var 1D /var>! Je m'appelle Julyan, et je suis la mère de Hildounet.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_JULYAN_000_011<tab>My dear boy's always had a bit of a rebellious streak. What can I say? I can come on a bit too strong at times.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_JULYAN_000_011<tab>Notre cher fils a quitté le domicile familial parce que j'ai été trop étouffante avec lui... il a fini par se rebeller et partir vivre sa vie. J'avais donc demandé à mon mari de prendre le relais et de le protéger dis<var 16 /var>crè<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment...

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_JULYAN_000_012<tab>But can ye blame me!? This time I thought I'd sit back and leave things to my sorry-arse husband here, and look what that got me! You'll help me out, won't ye?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_JULYAN_000_012<tab>Mais je n'aurais jamais dû le laisser aux commandes<var 1D /var>! Je peux compter sur ton aide, maintenant<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_PHILLICE_000_030<tab>Inspector Hildibrand's...mother?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_PHILLICE_000_030<tab>C-c'est la... femme... de monsieur Godbert<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_BRIARDIEN_000_035<tab>I daresay it's quite clear who wears the pants in the family...so to speak.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_BRIARDIEN_000_035<tab>Alors cette Julyan est la mère de Hildibrand... Une femme qu'on n'oublie pas, c'est le moins qu'on puisse dire.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_JULYAN_000_050<tab>Reunited with my dear boy for the first time in ages, and just look at him! He's...<var 1A 02 /var>green<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_JULYAN_000_050<tab>Zut<var 1D /var>! Alors que je retrouve enfin mon enfant chéri, voilà qu'il est en danger<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_JULYAN_000_051<tab>Fortunately, there's still time to reverse the zombie curse, and I know just the remedy: a phial o' holy water. The ingredients are simple: a tatter of Oversoul rags and a phial of twice-distilled water.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_JULYAN_000_051<tab>Heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, j'ai pu intervenir rapidement. Si on arrive à lui faire boire un contre-poison avant que la poudre n'ait com<var 16 /var>plè<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment envahi son corps, on devrait pouvoir contrer ses effets.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_JULYAN_000_052<tab>Syntgoht at the markets stocks the former, and the latter you can procure from a trader by the name o' Gest. Now hurry! Once the poison spreads throughout his veins, no antidote'll save him.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_JULYAN_000_052<tab>Tu veux bien aller me chercher <var 33 ((EventItem)) 02F61E8A970202 /var> et <var 33 ((EventItem)) 02F61E8A980202 /var><var 1D /var>? La première est vendue par Syntgoht aux marchés de l'allée du Rubis, et Gest devrait pouvoir te vendre l'eau. Avec ça, je pourrai fabriquer de l'eau bénite et inverser le processus de zombification.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_BRIARDIEN_000_053<tab>In the meantime, I will search for the bumbler's bumbling assistant. With any luck, Miss Nashu is still alive.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_BRIARDIEN_000_053<tab>Moi, je vais chercher l'assistante de Hildibrand. Nous l'avions un peu oubliée, mais Cecy a dû la capturer et l'enfermer quelque part pour pouvoir prendre sa place...

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GILGAMESH_000_054<tab>Ouch! That smarts. Ye gads, Hildy─you're looking none too hearty yourself!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GILGAMESH_000_054<tab>Ouh, ma tête... Euh<var 1D /var>! Comment va Hildidi<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_JULYAN_000_055<tab>No thanks to you, you bumbling oaf! Now, are ye going to accompany <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> here and make yourself useful, or do I have to reintroduce you to that wall!?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_JULYAN_000_055<tab>Il ira beaucoup mieux si vous vous bougez les fesses et que vous allez me chercher les ingrédients pour le sauver<var 1D /var>! Allez, vous accompagnez <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, et que ça saute<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GILGAMESH_000_056<tab>Er, ah...b-but of course, milady, Gilgamesh is ever at your service. Syntgoht's Sundries, was it? Come now, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! There is work to be done!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GILGAMESH_000_056<tab>Je... je... D'accord, compris, je vais au marché<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_JULYAN_000_060<tab>A piece of Oversoul rags from Syntgoht's Sundries and a bottle of twice-distilled water from the trader Gest! Now hurry, godsdammit─my dear boy's life is at stake!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_JULYAN_000_060<tab>Tu veux bien aller me chercher <var 33 ((EventItem)) 02F61E8A970202 /var> et <var 33 ((EventItem)) 02F61E8A980202 /var><var 1D /var>? La première est vendue par Syntgoht aux marchés de l'allée du Rubis, et Gest devrait pouvoir te vendre l'eau. Avec ça, je pourrai fabriquer de l'eau bénite et inverser le processus de zombification.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_SYNTGOHT_000_100<tab>Oversoul rags, you say? I fear that I've only a single tatter left in stock, and it's already been spoken for.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_SYNTGOHT_000_100<tab><var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((Bonsoir)) ((Bonjour)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((Bonjour)) ((Bonsoir)) /var>)) /var> <var 08 E905 ((ma petite dame)) ((mon bon monsieur)) /var><var 1D /var>! Qu'est-ce qui vous amène<var 1D /var>? Hum, <var 33 ((EventItem)) 02F61E8A970202 /var><var 1D /var>? Mal<var 16 /var>heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, c'est ma dernière et elle est déjà vendue...

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GILGAMESH_000_101<tab>But, my good man, you must reconsider! My dear friend's life─and quite possibly mine own as well─hangs in the balance!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GILGAMESH_000_101<tab>Vous plaisantez<var 1D /var>!? La vie de mon ami est en jeu, voyons<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_SYNTGOHT_000_102<tab>I sympathize with your plight, friend, but a man has to make a living. I've been promised a copious supply of rare chimera membrane for these rags. Unless you can offer me the same, no deal.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_SYNTGOHT_000_102<tab>Je regrette, je peux dif<var 16 /var>fi<var 16 /var>ci<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment annuler la vente... À moins que... Si vous m'apportiez une membrane de chimère, je pourrais peut-être faire quelque chose...

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GILGAMESH_000_103<tab>Gah! And you expect us to be able to summon such a rarity out of nowhere at a moment's notice!?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GILGAMESH_000_103<tab>On n'a pas le temps d'aller faire vos petites emplettes à votre place<var 1D /var>! D'autant qu'on est déjà en train de faire celles de m'dame Julyan<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_AVILA_000_104<tab>(-???-)...Well, look what we have here. If it isn't the Warrior of Light from the Coliseum. Funny who you meet at the markets.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_AVILA_000_104<tab>(-???-)Tiens donc<var 1D /var>! Je me disais bien que cette silhouette m'était familière. L'aventuri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var> qui m'a vaincue au Colisée, en personne<var 1D /var>! Qu'est-ce que tu fais ici<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_AVILA_000_105<tab>As it happens, I just returned from my training, and the slaying of ten chimeras just happened to be my task for the day. If it's chimera membrane you seek, you're more than welcome to a share.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_AVILA_000_105<tab>Hum, je vois... C'est votre jour de chance, je viens justement de chasser des chimères. Je veux bien vous donner une des membranes que j'ai récupérées sur leurs carcasses.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GILGAMESH_000_106<tab>My lady! You are far too kind!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GILGAMESH_000_106<tab>Oh, merci, Mam'zelle<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_AVILA_000_107<tab>Don't mention it. If it hadn't been for Inspector Hildibrand and <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> here, I'd still be tag teaming with that slimy beast and cheating my way to fame and fortune. ...And I'm a woman who pays her debts.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_AVILA_000_107<tab>Inutile de me remercier. J'avais une dette envers le détective, et voilà une excellente occasion de la régler.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_SYNTGOHT_000_108<tab>Thal take me if that wasn't Avila the Tempest! Ever since she confessed to her trickery and started climbing back up from the bottom of the ranks, I've been proud to call myself one of her biggest fans. Why, I've half a mind to give you the rags you seek simply for the privilege of meeting her!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_SYNTGOHT_000_108<tab>Oooh, c'était la fameuse Avila, l'ex-championne du Colisée qu'on surnommait l'Ouragan<var 1D /var>! Il paraît qu'elle tente de se racheter et de laver son image en se consacrant à des missions modestes. Enfin bref, je n'ai qu'une parole, alors voici l'objet. Je me débrouillerai pour en trouver une autre pour mon client<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GILGAMESH_000_109<tab>A kind sentiment, my good man, but we are more than happy to uphold our side of the bargain─aren't we, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? And with this, our task here is done. Now, let us find this trader named Gest!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GILGAMESH_000_109<tab>Elle n'a pas l'air commode, mais elle a bon cœur, dans le fond<var 1D /var>! Maintenant, nous devons trouver l'autre marchand, un certain Gest...

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_SYNTGOHT_000_120<tab>Why did you not tell me that you knew Avila the Tempest, friend!? Say, do you suppose you could come by front row seats for her upcoming bout?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_SYNTGOHT_000_120<tab>Avila “l'Ouragan” qui s'arrête dans ma boutique, quelle chance<var 1D /var>! Je suis justement un de ses fans, depuis quelque temps<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GEST_000_150<tab>The blundering Manderville boy is on his last legs and you need something of mine to save him, you say?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GEST_000_150<tab>Alors comme ça, l'enfant prodigue des Manderville est en mauvaise posture, et sa chère maman a besoin d'<var 33 ((EventItem)) 02F61E8A980202 /var> pour le soigner<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GEST_000_152<tab>Hmph... Perhaps you can give me a good reason why I should care. Those bloody Mandervilles are richer than the Traders Themselves, yet they have the audacity to haggle me down to the last gil for every purchase. If the family line ended today, I'd be a happier─and wealthy─man.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GEST_000_152<tab>Ne comptez pas sur mon aide. Cette famille nous met toujours en mauvaise posture, avec leurs conditions strictes en affaires. Et madame espère qu'on va lui faire cette faveur maintenant qu'elle a besoin de nous<var 1D /var>? Il ne faudrait pas pousser<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GEST_000_153<tab>...And now, I believe the ballroom calls. Good day to you, and do pass along my condolences to the grieving parents.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GEST_000_153<tab>Bref, je dois me rendre à un bal, je vous laisse.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GILGAMESH_000_154<tab>Have you not a shred of honor or compassion in that spindly body!? Business rival or no─the man is on death's doorstep!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GILGAMESH_000_154<tab>Mais qu'est-ce que c'est que cette attitude<var 1D /var>!? On leur parle d'un ami en danger de mort, et ils ne pensent qu'à leur petite personne<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_VANNES_000_155<tab>(-???-)After the events of that day, my father will not so easily forgive and forget─but it matters not to me. No, my love for you is as deep as the seven seas! I beg of you, milady, may I have this dance?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_VANNES_000_155<tab>(-???-)Mon père a été vexé après la fête de fiançailles ratée, mais moi, je suis tombé fou amoureux de toi, ma beauté<var 1D /var>! Je me noie dans la profondeur de tes yeux... Je t'en prie, accorde-moi cette danse<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_ARABELLA_000_156<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! What a lovely surprise. Are you here for the ball, perchance?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_ARABELLA_000_156<tab>Oh, mais c'est vous, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! Si je m'attendais à vous croiser aujourd'hui<var 1D /var>! Que faites-vous ici<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_ARABELLA_000_157<tab>Heavens! The poor inspector...
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_ARABELLA_000_157<tab>... Vraiment<var 1D /var>!? Oh, pauvre détective<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GEST_000_158<tab>Well, if it isn't the lapis maiden in the flesh! What say you bid farewell to preening fops and scruffy adventurers and share a dance with a cultured gentleman befitting your great beauty?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GEST_000_158<tab>Oh, mais c'est Arabella, la vierge lapis-lazuli<var 1D /var>! Laissez donc <var 08 E905 ((cette aventurière rustre)) ((ce jeune malotru)) /var>, et venez danser avec moi au bal<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_ARABELLA_000_159<tab>Why, it would be a pleasure and an honor both, milord.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_ARABELLA_000_159<tab>J'en serais très honorée, Monseigneur.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_ARABELLA_000_160<tab>...Provided you first provide my good friend <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> with the bottle of twice-distilled water that <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> seeks.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_ARABELLA_000_160<tab>Mais j'ai tout de même une faveur à vous demander d'abord. Pourriez-vous venir en aide à ces personnes, s'il vous plaît<var 1D /var>? Elles m'ont aidée, et je leur suis redevable.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GEST_000_161<tab>Y-You <var 1A 02 /var>know<var 1A 01 /var> this <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var>!? Bah...if that is the price you would set, then so be it. Take it─it's barely worth its weight in gil, anyway. Now, shall we, Miss Arabella?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GEST_000_161Si c'est vous qui me le demandez, alors je ne peux pas refuser!
Hé, toi, prends et file d'ici!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GILGAMESH_000_162<tab>I knew Hildy to be a worthy rival, but to think he was this beloved by so many! Clearly, this realm would deeply mourn his loss. Quickly, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Let us deliver these goods while there is still time to save him!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GILGAMESH_000_162<tab>Dites donc, vous en avez, des relations, Hildidi et toi<var 1D /var>! Bon, on n'a plus qu'à rapporter tout ça à m'dame Julyan...

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_JULYAN_000_200<tab>...I trust the two of ye wouldn't dare to come back empty-handed!?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_JULYAN_000_200<tab>Ah<var 1D /var>! J'ai failli attendre<var 1D /var>! J'espère que vous n'êtes pas revenus sans <var 33 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8A970202 /var> et <var 33 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8A980202 /var> que je vous avais demandés<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_JULYAN_000_201<tab>Bloody brilliant! Aye, I'd take you over my muscle-headed half-wit of a husband any day!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_JULYAN_000_201<tab>Oh, joli travail<var 1D /var>! Je vois que mon fils sait s'entourer d'amis efficaces<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_JULYAN_000_202<tab>Now, stand back and let me show you some real Manderville home cookin'!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_JULYAN_000_202<tab>Et maintenant, je vais m'occuper de préparer la recette avec tout mon amour maternel.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_JULYAN_100_202<tab>Thal, Ye bloody bugger, guide my skillet!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_JULYAN_100_202<tab>“Main sûre XX des Manderville”<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_JULYAN_000_203<tab>Aye, that should stop its spread. Now it's up to Hildy to flush what's left out o' his system. Don't worry, he's <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> son, after all─I reckon he's still got some fight left in him.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_JULYAN_000_203Ça devrait suffire... Maintenant, tout dépendra de sa capacité à se remettre.
Mon cher fils, tiens bon! Tu ne peux tout de même pas mourir comme ça, tu es un Manderville!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_BRIARDIEN_000_204<tab>Look who I found. She was slumbering obliviously in a rubbish-strewn corner of Pearl Lane.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_BRIARDIEN_000_204<tab>J'ai retrouvé la jeune Nashu. Elle dormait tran<var 16 /var>quil<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment dans un coin de la rue de la Perle.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_205<tab>Boy, did that nap feel good!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_205<tab>Aaah, j'ai fait une bonne sieste<var 1D /var>!!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_BRIARDIEN_000_206<tab>...Yes, I'm sure it did. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Word has it that Ellie has been sighted at the Sil'dihn ruins. We must go there with all haste.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_BRIARDIEN_000_206<tab>Sinon, Ellie a été repérée près de ruines sildiennes, d'après mes in<var 16 /var>for<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>tions. Allons-y sans plus tarder<var 1D /var>! Nous devons tout faire pour l'empêcher de commettre une erreur qu'elle regretterait toute sa vie, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_JULYAN_000_207<tab>Ye've done well by my dear boy today. Don't worry, I'll handle things from here. There's a nice warm bed for him, and I think I know a few specialists who might know a thing or two about his condition.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_JULYAN_000_207<tab>Je vais emmener mon fils se reposer et veiller sur lui. J'ai fait appel à des spé<var 16 /var>cia<var 16 /var>listes de ce genre d'affliction, ils devraient bientôt arriver.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_JULYAN_000_208<tab>...What in the seven hells are ye standin' around for!? The future of Ul'dah is at stake!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_JULYAN_000_208<tab>Ne tardez pas<var 1D /var>! L'avenir d'Ul'dah est entre vos mains. Je compte sur vous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GILGAMESH_000_209<tab>...<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. My strength is yours as well. For Ul'dah...and for our friend Hildy!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GILGAMESH_000_209<tab>Humpf<var 1D /var>! Bon, je veux bien participer à l'effort général, si c'est pour sauver Hildidi.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_JULYAN_000_210<tab>You! You remind me o' my husband, what with ye havin' more muscles than sense. If yer so keen on makin' yerself useful, why don't ye run to the markets and bring me some fire crystals?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_JULYAN_000_210<tab>Ah, l'arlequin en culotte bouffante, je vous avais oublié<var 1D /var>! Puisque vous avez de si gros bras, vous pourriez aller m'acheter de grandes quantités de cristaux de feu aux quartiers marchands<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_JULYAN_000_211<tab>Keepin' my dear boy warm is key to fightin' off the zombification. Let's see...I believe twenty crates or so should suffice.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_JULYAN_000_211<tab>Je veux faire chauffer de l'eau pour maintenir un certain taux d'humidité dans la chambre de mon fils.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GILGAMESH_000_212<tab>I-I am a warrior, not an err─ah...y-yes, milady!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GILGAMESH_000_212Hein? Qui ça, moi!?
(Quelle autorité, cette femme... Elle me fascine!)

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GILGAMESH_000_300<tab>I say, Enkidu! The burden we must bear simply to secure my long-awaited final confrontation with <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GILGAMESH_000_300Pfff! Moi qui voulais juste lancer un défi à )) (( )) 02 /var>, me voilà encore forcé d'accomplir les corvées de m'dame Julyan...
(J'ai toujours aimé les femmes à poigne...)

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GILGAMESH_000_301<tab>That said, the events of today have given me cause to reflect. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> and Hildy both─oh, to be blessed with such veritable legions of friends tried-and-true!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GILGAMESH_000_301<tab>Sacré Hildidi<var 1D /var>! Et même <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>... Ils ont des amis prêts à se mettre en quatre pour eux<var 1D /var>! Je les envie un peu.

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GILGAMESH_000_302<tab>But alas, not I! No... Only one true friend have I ever known, and she is long lost to me...
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GILGAMESH_000_302<tab>Moi, j'avais un super ami, autrefois. Hein, Enkidu<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GILGAMESH_000_303<tab>You are a fine bird, and have given me great comfort in my travels. But you will never be Enkidu, my one and true companion! Oh, my friend! Were you here with me, even <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> could not stand against our combined might!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GILGAMESH_000_303<tab>Ah, si seulement il était là... Ensemble, on ne ferait qu'une bouchée de <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GILGAMESH_000_304<tab>O, Enkidu, wherever you may wander! Hear my words, and return here to my side! Enkidu, do you hear me!? ENKIIIDUUUUUUUUUUUU!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GILGAMESH_000_304Si seulement il était là.
Si seulement il était là...

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GILGAMESH_000_305<tab>Ye gads! What was that flash from the heavens? It nearly blinded me! And...what!? The crystals! Where have they gone!?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GILGAMESH_000_305<tab>M-mais qu'est-ce que c'est que cette lumière<var 1D /var>!? L-les cristaux du coffre ont disparu... qu'est-ce que ça veut dire<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_ENKIDU_000_306<tab>(-???-)Fancy meeting you here...old friend.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_ENKIDU_000_306<tab>(-???-)Hé<var 1D /var>! C'est toi, Gilgamesh<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GILGAMESH_000_307<tab>That voice... Could it be...!?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GILGAMESH_000_307<tab>Qu-quoi<var 1D /var>? Cette voix... c'est impossible<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GILGAMESH_000_308<tab>My faithful companion... Why must you always make me wait so!?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB504_00493_GILGAMESH_000_308<tab>T'arrives bien trop tard<var 1D /var>!
